summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment froll of L.I.D. No. 6678 for the improvement of 36th Ave. E. from approximately 200 feet south of E. John St. to E. Harrison St.; and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by constructing underground utilities lines and residential street lighting system; under Ordinance No. 105804, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a local improvement fund.
